method.comment: /** Declares a binding from the service to itself. @param Class The service to bind. */

/** Unregisters all bindings for the specified service.
@param Class The service to unbind. */

/** Removes any existing bindings for the specified service, and declares a new one.
@param Class The service to re-bind. **/

/** Registers the specified binding.
@param IBinding The binding to add. */
/** Unregisters the specified binding. @param IBinding The binding to remove. */

property.name: Bindings
property.propertyComment: /** A collection of bindings, keyed by the service they bind to. */
